title: The refund of 100years
body:
i have heard that i can refund any kind of skin and champions for the exception.
In addition,i had done it through by my Korean account in Korea server. So, i could refund 4 or 5 species of skins and one champion that i bought by RP.
If, it's still available can i refund all of my skin ? And i want to buy any skin by my choice again. If, it's impossible. Can i refund some skin that i choose ?

Regards

replies.body:
Sorry I'm not quite getting what you're saying. But it might help for me to let you know that _**you only get 3 refunds per account**_. After you refund 3 skins or champions you will not have any more refunds. 

I hope that helps :D
